content:
ReliableSessionBindingElementImporter Class

Definition

Maps reliable session binding elements to and from representations of their corresponding policy assertions in metadata. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

public sealed class ReliableSessionBindingElementImporter : System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension
Inheritance
System.Object
ReliableSessionBindingElementImporter

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) uses this class to import reliable session binding elements to binding policy assertions in metadata. This class takes the reliable session binding elements and writes custom policy assertions into the WSDL file when on the service. On the client, it looks for those assertions and inserts a corresponding binding element back into the client binding. Note that the presence of a reliable session in a binding is rendered as the reliable message assertion described in the WS-Reliable Messaging Policy specification.

For more information about exchanging policy assertions between bindings to WSDL information see the IPolicyImportExtension and IPolicyExportExtension interfaces:

  • Implement the IPolicyImportExtension interface to search WSDL information exposed by a particular endpoint for custom policy assertions about endpoint capabilities or requirements.

  • Implement the IPolicyExportExtension interface on a System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement object to write statements about endpoint capabilities or requirements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular endpoint.

Constructors

ReliableSessionBindingElementImporter()

Initializes a new instance of the ReliableSessionBindingElementImporter class.

public ReliableSessionBindingElementImporter ();

Explicit Interface Implementations

IPolicyImportExtension.ImportPolicy(MetadataImporter,PolicyConversionContext)

Converts WS-Reliable Message policy assertions into the reliable session binding elements in a binding on the client.

void IPolicyImportExtension.ImportPolicy (System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter importer, System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext context);
importer
MetadataImporter

The MetadataImporter that imports the WSDL metadata into the binding element.

context
PolicyConversionContext

The PolicyConversionContext for the service endpoint that contains the binding policy assertions that must be converted into binding elements.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

The context or importer is null.

InvalidChannelBindingException

The policy assertion being read is invalid because it does not comply with WS-Reliable Messaging Policy.

Remarks

Implements the ImportPolicy method.
